name: BRIMO
description:
Can you get your name on the high score list?

A light-hearted arcade game made for the 2021 GoGodot Game Jam!

Instructions: Use the arrow keys to move Audrey and hold spacebar to spray water to keep the plants alive:

  • Get points by getting the plants to bloom and spread their seeds
  • Don't let the plants dry out,  or you'll lose health (the yellow "+" signs)
  • Refill your water at the Brimo pump
  • Watch out for UFOs and bump into mowers before they get your plants
  • Use power ups wisely
  • Get on the high score list and be admired by all players!

Made by Kimberly Blais of Mama Makes Games using Godot. Voice cameo by Brimstone. Music by Madame X.

Tested on Firefox, Chrome, Safari, and Edge browsers. Some 3D assets used in generating the game's renderings were created by N-Hance Studio and Synty Studios.

Like the game? I'm Kimberly Blais, a solo game developer and mom working on bringing new perspectives and fun to gaming. Check out my adventures on Instagram or Twitter to learn more! ❤️
